solution_line_template: Since one ton is {pounds_per_ton} pounds, three tons is {pounds_per_ton}*{num_tons}=<<{pounds_per_ton}*{num_tons}={total_pounds_material}>>{total_pounds_material} pounds.
Thus, in {total_pounds_material} pounds, he can make {total_pounds_material}/{foam_per_pillow}=<<{total_pounds_material}/{foam_per_pillow}={num_pillows}>>{num_pillows} pillows.
